mapper.insert:

update CTAS_AGT_ADJUST
COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_CODE = #{agentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
